## MakeOptional type

Makes specified keys of an interface optional while the rest stay the same.

<b>Signature:</b>

```typescript
export declare type MakeOptional<GType extends {}, GKeys extends Key<GType>> = Omit<GType, GKeys> & {
    [P in GKeys]+?: GType[P];
};
```
